refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: gsk_mime_make_transfer_encoding_decoders ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gsk_mime_make_transfer_encoding_decoders (const char *encoding, GskStream **write_end_out, GskStream **read_end_out, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Allocate an attached pair: one for writing and one for reading the decoded data. On error, set *error and return FALSE.

listitem.simpara: text representation of the encoding, either "identity", "base64" or "quoted-printable". If NULL, default to "identity".
location to store a reference to the write-end of the pipe. This must be unreferenced by the caller.
location to store a reference to the read-end of the pipe. This must be unreferenced by the caller.
location to store a GError if anything goes wrong.
whether the construction succeeded. If it returns FALSE, should examine *error to figure out why/inform the user.

refsect2.title: gsk_mime_make_transfer_encoding_encoders ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gsk_mime_make_transfer_encoding_encoders (const char *encoding, GskStream **write_end_out, GskStream **read_end_out, const char *bdy_string_out, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Allocate an attached pair: one for writing and one for reading the encoded data. On error, set *error and return FALSE.

listitem.simpara: text representation of the encoding, either "identity", "base64" or "quoted-printable". If NULL, default to "identity".
location to store a reference to the write-end of the pipe. This must be unreferenced by the caller.
location to store a reference to the read-end of the pipe. This must be unreferenced by the caller.
location to store a GError if anything goes wrong.
whether the construction succeeded. If it returns FALSE, should examine *error to figure out why/inform the user.

refsect2.title: gsk_mime_base64_decoder_new ()
refsect2.para: Allocate a new MIME encoder which takes base64 encoded data in and gives raw binary data out.

refsect2.title: gsk_mime_base64_encoder_new ()
refsect2.para: Allocate a new MIME encoder which takes raw binary data in and gives base64 encoded data out.

refsect2.title: gsk_mime_quoted_printable_decoder_new ()
refsect2.para: Allocate a new MIME encoder which takes quoted-printable encoded data in and gives raw binary data out. (See RFC 2045, Section 6.7).

refsect2.title: gsk_mime_quoted_printable_encoder_new ()
refsect2.para: Allocate a new MIME encoder which takes raw binary data in and gives quoted-printable encoded data out. (See RFC 2045, Section 6.7).

refsect2.title: gsk_mime_identity_filter_new ()
refsect2.para: A filter which gives the exact same output as it receives input.
